roleset.name: change
roleset.note: MODIFY-V NOTES: Name that movie! (from modify.01-v)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Sea Containers said the offer will proceed after the Bermuda Supreme Court lifts or modifies an interim injunction restraining the company from buying its shares.
example.arg: an interim injunction restraining the company from buying its shares

example.name: with start and end states
example.text: John modified his Jaguar from a sportster to a hearse.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Although Henry George accepted the principal hard core assumptions of the classical scientific research program, his modification of the program was premised on a new hard core proposition which rejected the equivalence between economic and social welfare established by classical economics.
